name: Osaurus Browser
description: Agent-friendly headless browser with ref-based interactions. Navigate to pages, get a snapshot of interactive elements, then interact using element refs.

tools.name: browser_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL. Use wait_until='networkidle' for SPAs that load content dynamically.

tools.name: browser_snapshot
tools.description: Get a structured list of interactive elements. CALL THIS FIRST after navigating. Returns element refs (E1, E2...) to use in click/type/select. Use filter to narrow down element types.

tools.name: browser_click
tools.description: Click an element using its ref from browser_snapshot (e.g., ref='E5').

tools.name: browser_type
tools.description: Type text into an input using its ref. Set submit=true to press Enter after typing.

tools.name: browser_select
tools.description: Select option(s) in a dropdown by value or visible text.

tools.name: browser_hover
tools.description: Hover over an element to reveal menus, tooltips, or trigger hover states.

tools.name: browser_scroll
tools.description: Scroll the page by direction (up/down/left/right), to an element ref, or to x/y coordinates.

tools.name: browser_press_key
tools.description: Press a keyboard key (Enter, Escape, Tab, arrows) optionally with modifiers (ctrl, shift, alt, cmd).

tools.name: browser_wait_for
tools.description: Wait for text to appear, text to disappear, or for a specified number of seconds.

tools.name: browser_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot for visual debugging. Use full_page=true for the entire scrollable page.

tools.name: browser_execute_script
tools.description: Execute arbitrary JavaScript. Use as escape hatch for edge cases not covered by other tools.
